## GrafanaConfig interface

Describes all the different Grafana configuration values available for an instance.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export interface GrafanaConfig 
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { GrafanaConfig } from '@grafana/data';
```
